label: DESI Dark Energy Alignment
wl_code: With[{b3 = 24, w0DESI = -0.957, w0Sigma = 0.067}, w0Theory = -1 + 1/b3; waTheory = 0.0; w0Deviation = Abs[w0Theory - w0DESI]/w0Sigma; {N[w0Theory, 6], N[w0Deviation, 3], "STERILE_STASIS"}]
note: Prediction: w0 = -23/24, wa = 0. DESI 2025: w0 = -0.957 +/- 0.067. Deviation: 0.02 sigma (consistent)
